import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function JudgeAuth(){const navigate=useNavigate();const pageStyle={minHeight:'100vh',// Ensure the page takes at least the full height of the viewport
display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'};const headingStyle={textAlign:'center',fontFamily:'Helvetica, sans-serif',fontStyle:'oblique',color:'black',fontSize:'68px'};const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=()=>{navigate("/judge-manager/app");};const containerStyle={width:'20%',height:'500px',backgroundColor:'#e5f2dc',padding:'20px'};const formStyle={display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',maxWidth:'300px',margin:'auto',marginTop:'50px',fontSize:'24px'};const inputStyle={margin:'8px',padding:'10px',width:'100%',boxSizing:'border-box'};const buttonStyle={backgroundColor:'#80a1e8',color:'white',padding:'10px',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:pageStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:containerStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:headingStyle,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{style:formStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",placeholder:"Enter your username",style:inputStyle,value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",placeholder:"Enter your password",style:inputStyle,value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",style:buttonStyle,onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]})]})});}export default JudgeAuth;
